bio: I am a retired English Instructor at the college level.  I have written more than 80 books in the last 7 years. Many are ghost written, and some are my own. All published on Amazon. I have written several e-books on how-to and self-help topics, as well as fiction in different genres.  Children's, teens' and adult books; romance, paranormal, adult romances, and erotic romance.  I follow your guidelines until you are satisfied with my work.  I guarantee your satisfaction. Being retired allows me to meet short deadlines better.  I am also seeking a publisher who is interested in publishing and promoting some of my own work. I have several already written and ready to go.

I prefer to be paid by the job or by word quantity and not hourly. I will send my work for your review so you can approve and stay informed how the work is coming.  I also do editing and am able to prepare your e-book for download to Amazon Kindle.

abstrac: Helping businesses succeed through exceptional web development services.
bio:
I am a highly skilled web developer with over 7 years of experience in the field. I have worked on a variety of projects, including eCommerce websites, LMS systems, and video conferencing systems. My expertise includes PHP, Laravel, Bootstrap, MERN/MEAN Stack, and various other technologies.
I am passionate about delivering exceptional custom web development services to businesses across different industries. I specialize in developing LMS websites and integrating video conferencing systems into existing websites. My strong coding skills and understanding of LMS logic enable me to create high-quality, responsive, and scalable websites that meet my clients' needs.
I pride myself on my attention to detail and ability to communicate effectively with my clients. I understand the importance of delivering projects on time and within budget, and I am committed to providing my clients with the best possible service.
If you are looking for a web developer who can help you build a high-quality LMS website or integrate a video conferencing system into your existing website, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to help businesses succeed in today's digital landscape.

1. Project Discussion and Requirements Gathering: Before starting any project, I will discuss with clients in detail to understand their business, requirements, target audience, and goals. Based on this information, I will provide recommendations and create a project plan.

2. Project Execution and Delivery: After the project plan has been finalized and approved, I will start the development process. Throughout the project, I will communicate progress and milestones with clients to ensure the project is on track. I will provide regular updates and deliver the final product on time.

3. Revisions and Changes: I understand that revisions and changes may be necessary during the project. I am flexible and willing to accommodate reasonable changes to ensure the project meets the client's requirements and satisfaction.

4. Payment Terms: I will provide a quote for each project based on the requirements and scope of work. A deposit is required before the project begins, and the remaining balance is due upon completion of the project. Payments can be made via PayPal or bank transfer.

5. Support and Maintenance: I offer ongoing support and maintenance services after the project is completed. This includes bug fixes, updates, and general support to ensure the project continues to meet the client's needs.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss your project further. I look forward to working with you!
